## Remarks <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType> event. This class provides the <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A> method to retrieve the exception.
## Examples The following example creates a new instance of <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs> and initializes it with an <xref:System.Exception>. Then the example calls <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A> to retrieve the <xref:System.Exception> and display the error message. There is no form associated with this code.
